entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing NativeAOT accidently includes any .dll next to .csproj as a FrameworkAssembly #77757
  • Setting the TCP keep alive for an HttpClient should be significantly simpler #77755
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedElementAt, Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedFindIndex #77754
  • Setting NullabilityInfoContextSupport=false in NativeAOT doesn't remove NullableAttribute/NullableContextAttribute ctors #77753
  • Need way to exclude specified assemblies from automatic loading via the dependency file and not bypass AssemblyResolve #77751
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException helper methods #77749
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot doesn't warn for base/override annotation mismatch on generic virtual methods #77744
  • Make Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.CopyTo public #77743
  • ReadyToRun: How to detect target compilation platform ? #77742
  • Clean-up gtGetLclVarName and gtDispLclVar #77741
    Future
  • [release/7.0] WBT tests disabled, till a new sdk is available #77740
  • Replace native `ComWrappers` implementation with NativeAOT version #77738
    Future
  • Cipher suite not enabled even though being explicitly set/provided. #77752
  • It is recommended that BinaryWriter and BinaryReader add support for large terminal read/write methods #77736
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Accurately log catastrophic test failures and freezes in source-gened test infrastructure #77735
    8.0.0
  • [Test failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #77726
    8.0.0
  • The "Collection was of a fixed size." exception when configuring options. #77725
  • Unable to build: Unable to load Analyzer assembly #77723
  • "unmanaged memory" issue with dotnet 6 #77722
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount is broken for numbers with a lot of trailing zeros. #77720
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 16 Regressions on 10/25/2022 7:09:53 PM #77732
  • Regressions from Array.Initialize change #77730
  • [API Proposal]: Linq CountBy method #77716
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonReader.TryCopyString #77714
  • [libraries-pgo arm32] Failure in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.AggregateExceptionTests.Flatten #77710
    8.0.0
  • Setting `RunAOTCompilation=true` on non-wasm/non-mobile projects fails to build #77707
    8.0.0
  • Delete HNDTYPE_WEAK_NATIVE_COM when no longer needed. #77703
    Future

Closed

  • NET-6 - Error on loading default value of My.Settings #74528
    Future
  • [Proposal] Add string.RemoveCharacters(string) #41287
    Future
  • SetTcpKeepAlive() is a no-op #77758
  • System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource: Activity with null operation name #77621
    8.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfoTests.ConvertTimeFromToUtc_UnixOnly test fails around DST change #77648
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in IndexOf #54165
    8.0.0
  • Serialization.Formatters.Tests - numerous failures with server GC #58642
    8.0.0
  • Audit and cleanup the generic math API docs #69694
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Bmi2 - ADCX and ADOX instructions missing. #72423
    Future
  • Convert.ChangeType does not work with DateOnly #73074
    Future
  • Edge case issue with System.Numerics.BigInteger #77081 #77729
  • RFC: MARK in Regular Expressions #25431
    Future
  • [wasm] `browser-eventpipe` sample broken with `PerfTracing` build - `JSExportAttribute' is only supported on: 'browser'` #77630
    8.0.0
  • Tracing a very simple .NET 6 Android app with AOT shows calls to RuntimeHelpers.CompileMethod #77479
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json #77731
  • System.Drawing enumerations cause CA1416 errors when a project compiled against .NET 7 RC2 #77248
    8.0.0
  • [Test failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #77724
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 8 Regressions on 10/25/2022 10:16:52 PM #77546
  • For HttpClient with HttpMessageHandler is getting called multiple times for single SendAsync #77495
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding #68405
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding with nested types and readonly properties not working #77677
    8.0.0
  • Test failure R2R-CG2 windows arm64 Checked @ Windows.10.Arm64v8.Open JIT\\jit64\\mcc\\interop\\mcc_i17\\mcc_i17.cmd #77662
  • [API Proposal]: ring buffer #77718
  • [wasm] ManagedError constructor has significant overhead due to reading Error.stack #77473
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/Desktop/boxunboxvaluetype_do/boxunboxvaluetype_do.sh #77706
  • RyuJIT: Extend "cns".Length optimization to support static readonly fields #42087
    8.0.0
  • Bound checks for static readonly arrays #76578
    8.0.0
  • Serialized type name decoder and encoder for SR.Metadata #27288
    Future
  • ECMA metadata document inaccurate or bugged #28442
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Incorrect CodeView type information emitted for enums #77564
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT x86: improve localloc codegen in some cases #6546
    Future
  • Use "DOTNET_EnableCrashReport" create report, but "*.crashreport.json" file was not found #77671
    8.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler is inconsistent with header value trimming on HTTP/1.1 #77001
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[wasm] browser profiler (#77449)" #77759
    test-failure, arch-wasm, blocking-clean-ci, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize XxHash3 #77756
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 6.0.12 #77750
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable phi-based jump threading when SSA updates aren't needed #77748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: increase edge weight slop tolerance some more #77747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77734
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug with BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount #77727
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Support profiles with only histograms #77721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #77709
    area-Interop-mono
  • Control if invalid configuration values are swallowed or thrown #77708
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fixing a logging bug when a single non-object array is cast to object[] #77702
    area-Extensions-Logging

Merged

  • Fix Activity.OperationName when Activity is created with null value #77746
    breaking-change, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 8.0.0
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo test failure #77745
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77682
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update the Nuget Config used for Maui net6 apps. #77739
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add readmes for configuration packages, part 1 #77733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixing VarLocInfo on JITDUMP #77700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] browser profiler #77449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update SuperPMI artifact logging #77685
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #77704
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Run dotnet-format for ThunkGenerator #77715
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update some documentation #77711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve WoA workflow documentation #77691
    area-Meta
  • First pass at adding a test to reproduce the problem. #77693
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Avoid running R2RDump if crossgen2 failed #77705
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update a few dependencies #77678
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold bound checks for static readonly arrays/strings #77593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a bit of dead code #77655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add doc describing well-known properties that the host can pass to the runtime #76732
    area-Host
  • [NativeAOT] Don't generate extra structure record in debugging information for enums #77684
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `MetaDataTracker` #77701
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Mark and expose additional Vector functions as Intrinsic #77562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #77549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, blocking, 7.0.x
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update release/7.0 Perf infrastructure to use Perf repo release/7.0 branch #77699
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Added ConnectionString Support for Extra Azure Service Connection Types #77670
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #77125
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] Free `LOADERHANDLE` `DispatchMemberInfo` dtor #77570
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.1
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy constructor selection #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77388
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.1
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • Optimize ManagedError ctor and (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add support for `<assembly fullname="*">` #1381

PullRequests

Created

  • Add prolog stack check for green threads #2064

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • New helper for green thread stack segments #2056

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Target runtime preprocessor directives #28837
  • `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Publish.ZipDeploy.targets` fails to create `PubTmp` temporary directory on `dotnet publish` #28830

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28844
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.404 #28841
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not eagerly discover CWD during parser construction #28836
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx

Merged

  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.3xx branch #28745
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.112 #28839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.307 #28840
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.426 #28838
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.101 #28795
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Switch back to the shipped RC2 build #28785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable codeql in servicing #28605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.1xx branch #28744
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set the Framework and Runtime options as required for 'dotnet store' #25435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • removed `v` prefix from `dotnetcli` host version #28776
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28828
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113

    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic snippets: `interface` snippet prefix and more #65151
  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet inserts unexpected blank line when between statements #65150
  • C# compiler: severe performance issues with sister project #65142
  • Goldbar with KeyNotFoundException in CompilationTracker.FinalizeCompilationAsync #65138
  • GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig reference can exceed maximum string length #65134

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common package 4.3.1 references invalid 4.3.0 assembly version for netstandard2.0 #64926
  • Fix all without preview dialog #51310
    Backlog
  • CreateHostClientAsync takes 10-15 seconds to complete #51198
  • C# project's GoToDefinition sets target framework incorrectly #51031
    Backlog
  • IDE Code Style Analyzer to remove empty lines #50471
    Backlog
  • Ctrl+Q search results are duplicated #50437
    Backlog
  • Support syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and compile errors in code that is commented out using #if #50341
    Backlog
  • Popup font size for collapsed JavaScript is much smaller than for collapsed CSS & HTML #49667
    Backlog
  • Intellicode Global Find/Replace #49665
  • Generate override ToString() method to concatenate fields together #49578
    Backlog
  • Productivity feature: Add logger to class #49572
    Backlog
  • CodeAnalysis method NotSupportedException #49407
    Backlog
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Backlog
  • Reset settings Visual Studio #48863
    Backlog
  • Convert 'if' to 'switch' code fix suggested for comparisons with implicit casts #48832
    Backlog
  • Lock contention in ProjectCacheService.CacheObjectIfCachingEnabledForKey causes high CPU usage and slow Find All References #48488
    Backlog
  • Add a reference to System.Linq automatically when LINQ is used #48025
    Backlog
  • Infrastructure: Extract tests that don't require editor to Workspaces and Features layer tests #7039
    Backlog
  • [C# 9.0] Remove unnecessary cast doesn't know about target typing ? and ?? #47620
    Backlog
  • Add an error or warning for empty top level statements in c# 9 #47599
  • StackOverflowException on self reference #47435
  • Find All References does not find implicitly typed usage #47393
    Backlog
  • OOP doesn't synchronize non-C#/VB projects/documents. #47341
    Backlog
  • Call for cooperation between VS C# components #47036
    Backlog
  • Constant errors regarding "Diagnostic Analyzer runner" crashing #65064
  • Making "readonly" keyword available also in functions not only Constructor #46951
  • Add Codespaces support to Inline Parameter Name Hints #46792
  • Add text search in Go To with it's own keyboard shortcut #46640
  • Add `To` and `Fro` connectors from Object browser to Decompiled sources. #46560
    Backlog
  • More completions for generics arguments #46503
    Backlog
  • SyntaxNode.WithAdditionalAnnotations should throw if node is unsupported #46481
    Backlog
  • IDE error when accidentally combining a For-Loop with an Enumeration and a minus sign #46350
    Backlog
  • ViewModel violates DRY; here is the fix! #46274
    Backlog
  • Use MEF v2 for request handlers so we can use content type #46195
    Backlog
  • Object Browser question #45992
    Backlog
  • Convert /*??*/ comments to ?? operator #43390
    Backlog
  • Expose SyntaxFactory.AreEquivalent from SyntaxTree #45196
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb Code Fix for Missing using not working properly since update to 16.6.2 #45108
    Backlog
  • Tighten completion for `with` initializer #45014
    Backlog
  • Adding parameter should select it and scroll it into view in the datagrid (but not necessarily focus it) #44996
    Backlog
  • Add WithChanges to Solution, Project, Document. #44747
    Backlog
  • Fix All Preview should break down by projects and files, not just files #44740
    Backlog
  • VS should offer to simplify null conditional calls #44554
    Backlog
  • Codespaces nav-to doesn't show progress #44352
    Backlog
  • Suggest using declaration when the only statement outside the using statement has no interactions #42194
    Backlog
  • [question] How do I let users configure an analyzer? #43874
    Backlog
  • CSharpSpellCheckCodeFixProvider encoutered and error and has been disabled #44299
    Backlog
  • Pasting text with quotes into a verbatim string literal should double the quotes #44203
    Backlog
  • Add Classification API which mirrors the proposed LSP Semantic Tokens API #44155
    Backlog
  • wrong number of references #44138
    Backlog
  • Rename/refactor of using alias directive is not applied to references in file, but wait, there's more... #44135
    Backlog
  • Source generators: feedback on SyntaxFactory #43979
  • Optimization proposal: Specify capacity for collection initialization for well-known types #43944
  • Unable to find roslyn workspace in Source Generators #43905
  • No keyboard mnemonics on "Preview Changes" dialog's buttons #43778
  • Visual Basic iif statement delay evaluation of iif results until necessary #43417
  • VS 2019 16.5.3 - database project type - code fix provider error #43310
    Backlog
  • Visual studio keeps crashing when attempting to complete line of code #43221
    Backlog
  • [Refactoring] Extract class #22053
    Backlog
  • "Extract Method + Local" causes integration test failures #34070
  • Make individual portions of 'Rename' public. #43055
    Backlog
  • Need to ensure cast-simplification works properly with intptr/nint #42888
    Backlog
  • Add more search options in VS.NET #42728
    Backlog
  • Consider using IParameters instead of Parameter wrapper classes. #42687
    Backlog
  • go-to decompiled source should have an option allowing user to opt-out without being prompted again #42638
    Backlog
  • Missing suggestion for generic types on unimported types, like `Collection<>` #42561
    Backlog
  • Symbol completion and target-typed new #42556
    Backlog
  • Expose Rolsyn IDE features through LSP #42427
    Backlog
  • 'Convert to interpolated string' should not nest an existing interpolated string #42195
    Backlog
  • Remove UnitTestingIncrementalAnalyzer #42187
    Backlog
  • Need an IDE level API that matches arguments to parameters #42149
  • IntelliSense should take into account DescriptionAttribute if there is no XML documentation on a code element. #41876
    Backlog
  • Ask for "Derived types" from contextual menu #41875
    Backlog
  • Turn on navigate to decompiled sources instead of it being behind a feature flag #41766
    Backlog
  • Bringing up CodeActions *in* Roslyn.sln takes a very long time now. #41667
    Backlog
  • Prevent Drop VB line Continuation #41663
    Backlog
  • Go to Base should not include Object #41614
    Backlog
  • Roslyn ServiceHub OOM #40763
    Backlog
  • Add a public member of CompletionContext that allows callers to get a snapshot of the completion items for testing purposes #41311
    Backlog
  • Analyzer suggestion: Use lambda expression #52772
  • In Visual Studio/.editorconfig for C#, add new predefined type preferences "For objects" #56504
  • TaskCanceledException in TodoCommentIncrementalAnalyzer.GetTodoItems #41158
    Backlog
  • Add Parameter - Handle multiple TODOs #41050
    Backlog
  • Simplifying object instantiating where expected type is known #41014
  • FAR (Find All References) UI Updates #40963
    Backlog
  • FAR (Find All References) to have more group by options #40962
    Backlog
  • Strange yellow-bad notification about TFMs and nuget TMs. #40899
    Backlog
  • Go To Derived Types #40847
    Backlog
  • Add Item does not support Enum type #40798
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Suggestion: Predictive Errors #40621
    Backlog
  • Indicate direct inheritors in Go To Implementation #40609
    Backlog
  • code clean up is not working on all instances #40480
    Backlog
  • Tests not running on latest VS #40267
    Backlog
  • Invalid "IDE0062 Local function can be made static" when local function calls a local function that captures a struct parameter #40259
    Backlog
  • Guard all LSP entry points against crashing #40177
    Backlog
  • Should the Rename API (and the IDE layers in general) be less aggressive about crashing when something goes wrong? #40176
    Backlog
  • Slow completion in CodeGenerationPointerTypeSymbol.cs #40120
    Backlog
  • OOP: KeyNotFoundException from RequestAsset #40073
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix implement-interface with parameterized properties #65154
    Area-IDE
  • Allow [UnscopedRef] annotation for ref and in parameters #65153
    Area-Compilers
  • Show explicit error message when extracting interface from module #65152
    Area-IDE
  • Improve decl name suggestions for out-vars #65149
    Area-IDE
  • Account for possible failures during attribute retargeting. #65143
    Area-Compilers
  • Add langversion checks for lambda optional and `params` parameters #65140
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure the lookup return the CompletionProvider if exist #65133
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix a race between AsyncQueue operations #65078
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cleanup ?? usage #65147
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve 'use simple using statement' for a few cases. #65145
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix null ref in declaration name computation #65146
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65079
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move test method to test code #64005
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65073
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix implement-interface collisions with ref-returning indexers #65132
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Better name suggestions when creating new out-variables #65129
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Display lambda default parameter values in QuickInfo #65045
    Area-IDE

entry.content:
Issues

Created

    Backlog
  • MAUI Conversion From XF App does not read App.xml at all #11039
    Backlog
  • Win32 exception on startup when using dependency injection with ContentPage #11038
  • CollectionView: RemainingItemsThreshold not working properly #11037
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Apps: Integrate API Controllers to fetch data offline via https://0.0.0.0/api/method calls from Javascript Frameworks #11033
  • Checking Permission status throw exception instead of returning the status #11032
  • ScrollView when added with Bindable layout does not work after api call or some seconds delay #11031
    Backlog
  • Multi attach a same Style with AdaptiveTrigger #11030
    Backlog
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor not working when FlyoutBehavior is locked. #11028
    Backlog
  • When the flow direction is changed in ScrollView as RTL, the scrolling direction remains unchanged in iOS and macOS #11026
    Backlog
  • Can't dynamically set HasShadow on Frame #11025
    Backlog

Closed

  • Maui Blazor app truncated on Mac #10911

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated
